file_content.text: That's enough of you, scum.
Thanks for your help, kid. You done good by me.
Where is he? Where's my brother?
He was a coward and a traitor. He got what he deserved, and so did I.
He's dead.
Well, at least you're honest about it. Doesn't make you any less scum, but at least you're honest.
Um, oh, yes--I forgot about that.
Oops.
Forgot? I don't think so.
I got there too late. Fa'athra's thugs had already killed him.
There was nothing I could do.
You'd better not be lying to me.
You went in there, you came out, but my brother didn't. If I find out you had the chance to save his skin and you didn't....
I'm sorry, but it was just too much money to refuse.
It was good money.
Just pay up.
Pay? You really think I'm gonna pay you for leaving my brother behind?
I don't care.
Just get out of here. I've had enough of you scum.
I just heard from my little brother, and it's a good thing, too.
Fa'athra don't look like he's about to let up, and if it gets much worse, Nem'ro might start being more picky about who he lets on board the shuttles.
In that case, you two had better get going.
Then hurry!
And my reward?
It would've gone a lot faster if your brother hadn't been such a snivelling coward and got himself thrown in a cage.
Your brother is an idiot.
Can't blame the kid for being naive. They paint you a pretty picture when they try to recruit you.
I can't thank you enough, kid. Here're the credits I promised--be careful on Hutta, though.
Hutts'll eat you alive if you let them.
Get to my brother and get him to come back here. Nem'ro's gang is no life for him.
Welcome to Hutta, kid. You're new here, you look pretty tough, but let me give you a word of advice.
Welcome to Hutta, kid. You're new here, you look like you got a bright future, so let me give you a word of advice.
Watch your back out there, learn how to please the people in charge, and as soon as you can, get out.
I don't plan to stay any longer than I have to.
Don't worry about me.
You've got a good head on you, then. Just hope that when you're ready to leave you still can.
You make Hutta sound like such a wonderful place to be.
Sounds awful.
The gang wars on Hutta are like the swamps. Wade far enough in and you'll find yourself stuck, and sinking fast.
Leave me alone.
No, but I'm offering it.
There's a gang war raging out there right now. If you wanna survive on Hutta, you're gonna have to learn the ropes.
I can get you experience navigating Hutta's gangs, help you build your reputation, if you help me out.
Now you're finally saying something interesting.
You have my attention.
Of course, there's always a catch.
Nothing's ever free.
This is a gangster town, controlled by a greedy and cruel Hutt named Nem'ro--as if there was any other kind.
Anything Nem'ro sees, he takes. Including you, if you let him. I should know--I spent ten years trying to escape this planet, and now here I am again.
Why did it take you so long to escape? And why are you back?
How did that happen?
You mentioned a job. What is it you wanted my help with?
Just tell me what you want.
Do I care?
If you know what's good for you, you'll learn from one that knows.
Used to be I worked for Nem'ro's gang. Violent, bloody life. That's why I left. But now my little brother's following in my footsteps.
Nem'ro's street gang leader, Rex Geer, is my old buddy. I thought he might help get my brother out, but I can't get to Rex for all the fighting.
Just point me in the right direction. I'll show them the business end of my blaster.
They won't stop me.
I hope you're right about that.
I'm good at getting in places I don't belong.
They won't stop me.
That's what I like to hear.
What do you need?
Some big, tough gangster you turned out to be.
You're scared, huh?
I been outta that life a long time now, and I'm not so young anymore.
The problem is, Nem'ro's enemy, Fa'athra, has my buddy Rex and his men pinned down. Fa'athra's gang are more like animals than people.
If you could blast your way through them and talk to Rex--convince him to let my brother go--I'd be grateful.
Sure.
I'm glad to hear it. If you're successful, I should be able to swing a favor, or some credits, for it as well.
And what exactly do I get out of it? I mean, besides a reputation?
Is there pay?
I don't have the time.
I told you what you stand to gain in terms of reputation, but if that's not enough, I think I can swing some credits.
In that case, I'm in.
Well, okay.
Consider it done.
Glad to hear it.
You'll find Nem'ro's boys holed up in Jiguuna, but you're gonna need to fight through Fa'athra's thugs--so be careful.
I told you already, I have better things to do.
No thanks. [Refuse quest]
Fair enough. But I hope you'll reconsider. You won't get very far on Hutta by looks alone--you need reputation.
I'd be just as happy if I never saw this place again.
This should be great.
